txt.en: Ancient moon-letters are waiting to be uncovered by those who brave the long forgotten halls, deep within the Pit of Stonejaws.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
'What is this? You have slain a high ranking leader of the Frost-horde? I praise you for your efforts and your talents, [placeholder].'

'Deep within the ancient halls of Stonejaws are riches of lore, in the form of moon-letters. The journey there is not an easy one, however, we need the forgotten letters to learn more about Gundabad's history. Are you willing to take on this task?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest. This quest can be completed with one or two adventurers.</rgb>
You should return to Zádokh Flint-eye and apprise him of your efforts.
